verses.verse: And <S%H5070>Nadab<s%> and <S%H30>Abihu<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H376>either<s%> of them his <S%H4289>censer<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> in <S%H2004>it<s%>, and <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> on <S%H7126>it<s%>, and offered <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which he commanded them <S%H6680>not<s%>.
And there went <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and <S%H398>devoured<s%> <S%H4191>them<s%>, and they died <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, This is it that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I will be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them that come <S%H7138>near<s%> <S%H6440>me<s%>, and before all the <S%H5971>people<s%> I will be <S%H3513>glorified<s%>. And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> held his <S%H1826>peace<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H4332>Mishael<s%> and <S%H469>Elzaphan<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%> the <S%H1730>uncle<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7126>them<s%>, Come near, <S%H5375>carry<s%> your <S%H251>brothers<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.
So they went <S%H7126>near<s%>, and <S%H5375>carried<s%> them in their <S%H3801>coats<s%> <S%H2351>out<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%>; as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H1696>said<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and unto <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, his <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H6544>Uncover<s%> not your <S%H7218>heads<s%>, neither <S%H6533>tear<s%> your <S%H899>clothes<s%>; lest you <S%H4191>die<s%>, and lest <S%H7107>wrath<s%> come upon all the <S%H5712>people<s%>: but let your <S%H251>brothers<s%>, the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H1058>bewail<s%> the <S%H8316>burning<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H8313>kindled<s%>.

And you shall not go <S%H3318>out<s%> from the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, lest you <S%H4191>die<s%>: for the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is upon <S%H6213>you<s%>. And they did according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Do not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> nor strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>, <S%H1121>you<s%>, nor your sons with <S%H935>you<s%>, when you go into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, lest you <S%H4191>die<s%>: it shall be a <S%H2708>statute<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%>:
And that you may put <S%H914>difference<s%> between <S%H6944>holy<s%> and <S%H2455>unholy<s%>, and between <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and <S%H2889>clean<s%>;

And that you may <S%H3384>teach<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> all the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto them by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H175>Aaron<s%>, and unto <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and unto <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, his <S%H1121>sons<s%> that were <S%H3498>left<s%>, <S%H3947>Take<s%> the food <S%H4503>offering<s%> that <S%H3498>remains<s%> of the <S%H801>offerings<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>, and <S%H398>eat<s%> it without <S%H4682>yeast<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%>: for it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>:

And you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in the <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, because it is your <S%H2706>due<s%>, and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H2706>due<s%>, of the <S%H801>sacrifices<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made by <S%H801>fire<s%>: for so I am <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> and <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> shall you <S%H398>eat<s%> in a <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>; <S%H1121>you<s%>, and your sons, and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with you for they be your <S%H2706>due<s%>, and your <S%H1121>sons<s%>' <S%H2706>due<s%>, which are <S%H5414>given<s%> out of the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

The <S%H8641>heave<s%> <S%H7785>shoulder<s%> and the <S%H8573>wave<s%> <S%H2373>breast<s%> shall they <S%H935>bring<s%> with the offerings made by <S%H801>fire<s%> of the <S%H2459>fat<s%>, to <S%H5130>wave<s%> it for a wave <S%H8573>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and it shall be <S%H1121>your<s%>, and your sons' with <S%H2706>you<s%>, by a statute for <S%H5769>ever<s%>; as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1875>diligently<s%> <S%H1875>sought<s%> the <S%H8163>goat<s%> of the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>, <S%H8313>and<s%>, behold, it was burnt: and he was <S%H7107>angry<s%> with <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> and <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> which were <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H559>alive<s%>, saying,

Why have you not <S%H398>eaten<s%> the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%>, seeing it is <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%>, and God has <S%H5414>given<s%> it you to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%>, to make <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?

<S%H2005>Behold<s%>, the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of it was not <S%H935>brought<s%> in <S%H6441>inside<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H398>place<s%>: you should indeed have <S%H398>eaten<s%> it in the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6680>place<s%>, as I commanded.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3117>Behold<s%>, this day have they <S%H7126>offered<s%> their sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> and their burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; and such things have <S%H7122>happened<s%> <S%H398>me<s%>: and if I had eaten the sin <S%H2403>offering<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%>, should it have been <S%H3190>accepted<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>?
And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3190>that<s%>, he was content.
